reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits true to size and is comfortable, with one noting the material isn't itchy at all.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color and style!
items.body: Beautiful dress! Really impressed with the quality and texture. The dress has a good weight to it and I love the fabric it's thick and double lined the outer flower pattern sits on top of the bottom layer similar to a slip. The dress is comfortable and not itchy at all! Great fit I am 5'4, 165lbs and purchased a Medium. Might be too short as a full length gown for someone taller than me thou. The sleeves flare out nicely in a subtle way which I appreciate! Would recommend and I plan on wearing it to a formal December wedding. Read more
items.author: Christina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Dress is 10/10! âœ¨
items.body: Love this dress! I got this in size small and in the color rust. This dress is the perfect autumn dress that I was looking for! It is elegant and the material was absolutely comfortable and loved how it fit me well! I like that the sleeves had a slight sheerness to it and the wavy detail at the cuff of the sleeve. The dress itself is double lined and of excellent quality! Read more
items.author: Trish Ragsdale

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it- worked for pregnancy!
items.body: Absolutely loved this dress! Purchased for a wedding and it was so comfortable, the fabric was soft and stretchy not stiff and scratchy. Iâ€™m 5â€™10â€ with a muscular build, normally 160lbs but currently 20wks pregnant at 165lbs. I ordered a medium and it fit really well. If I wasnâ€™t pregnant I might have considered sizing down to a small based on some other reviews. It did seem a little loose under my armpits but i donâ€™t like things tight around my arms anyway so i was ok with it. I felt like the price was really affordable as well and that it had a good quality. I noticed some other reviews stated the dress had a smell to it but the one I ordered did not have any smell. All in all, I was really happy with the dress and will definitely keep to wear again and may order other colors. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Showstopper.
items.body: This dress was a hit! I received so many compliments when I wore it to church from both my sisters and brothers in Christ. Itâ€™s absolutely beautiful in-person and the quality is great. The dress is lined and very warm despite the mesh sleeves, the material is stretchy, soft and flatters the body, hugging your curves and creating a wonderful silhouette, and what I thought was merely a floral print is actually appliquÃ© embroidery - creating a dimensional, textured look. This dress is elegant but FIRE at the same time. I went through a drive-thru after church and the guy who gave me my food order even complimented it. I honestly cannot wait to wear it again. ðŸ’“ Read more
items.author: BoyMom2

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars too big through the waist
items.body: wearing this as a bridesmaid dress. it's too big through the waist, but otherwise fits well. overall, its very pretty, good quality, and i love the sleeves. Read more
items.author: Liv

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and gorgeous!
items.body: I was really hesitant about how this dress would look because I donâ€™t have a perfect flat tummy, especially postpartum. I wore it yesterday to an event and got compliments from every single person I talk to! It is so flattering and beautiful, I especially love the sleeves. I did wear some Shapeware underneath, but if I had a touch more confidence, I definitely wouldnâ€™t need it. Definitely recommend though. Fit true to size and not too long. I am 5â€˜3â€œ and 140 pounds, wasnâ€™t too long. I did wear it with 1 inch kitten heels. Read more
items.author: Tori Shields

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better in person! Highly recommended
items.body: I found this dress because a fitness influencer I follow posted how she found a last-minute dress for a wedding that she had! She shared the link and I just loved the way it looked on her. My first choice is never a blue colored dress, but literally it ended up being a perfect fit And such a beautiful color! I wore this for Thanksgiving. Definitely highly recommend. Just for reference I ordered a size small, I am 130 pounds and 54â€™. Definitely room, has some stretch. As far as length goes it was perfect to wear with a high heel fall boot. I plan on buying the black for a future wedding I have next year! Read more
items.author: Chelsea

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible smell, pretty dress
items.body: It does fit beautifully and I got a lot of compliments wearing it, but the dress came smelling of fish. The moment I opened the package my entire room was filled with the smell and I had to run it through the wash twice to get rid of it. I truly gagged when I got it, thatâ€™s how bad it was. If it werenâ€™t for the smell, I would rate it 4 stars and say while it slips on easy, a zipper would have been a nice inclusion. The stretch is really nice on the dress, I got the XXL and wore shapewear to smooth my apron belly and it was a bit loose with much more room to stretch. If you want it more form fitting like in the picture, Iâ€™d size down one size. Itâ€™s a great fall date night dress. Read more
items.author: Marie-Louise

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Bodycon Long Sleeve Cocktail Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Bodycon Long Sleeve Cocktail Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Bodycon Long Sleeve Cocktail Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Pink, Rust, Purple, Burgundy, Royal Blue, Army Green, Hot Pink, Black, Dusty Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
